title: JohnyBitcoin
author: JohnyBitcoin
content: Does anyone here use Xanpool? I have used them a lot in the past to sell my crypto for cash. Now they seemed to have stopped, at least in Hong Kong. Took my crypto and never paid out. Now don't respond at all.I would very much hesitate to use them in other countries now, seeing that they probably took the money and ran. Another crypto scam...
